comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

Tab previews sometimes show incorrect titles.Happens sporadically so no way (yet) to reproduce reliably.

Reproducible: Sometimes

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Set the following pref to true in about:config - browser.taskbar.previews.enable
2.Browse with many pages for a while.
3.Move mouse to see tab previews.
Actual Results:  
Sometimes some tabs have titles that do not correspond to what they're showing.

Expected Results:  
Tab previews should always show tab title as it appears in tabs on tabbar.

Using default theme on Firefox 4.Windows 7 x64.Currently did not try disabling addons and customizations to see if this resolves the problem.Not easy to spot due to the issues trying to reproduce this.
comments.creator: tamma00@gmail.com
